title: KHR_materials_clearcoat glTF extension
description: glTF extension that defines the clearcoat material layer.

clearcoatFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The clearcoat layer intensity (aka opacity) of the material. A value of 0.0 means the material has no clearcoat layer enabled.

clearcoatTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The clearcoat layer intensity texture. These values are sampled from the R channel.  The values are linear.  Use value 1.0 if no texture is supplied.

clearcoatRoughnessFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The clearcoat layer roughness of the material.

clearcoatRoughnessTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The clearcoat layer roughness texture. These values are sampled from the G channel.  The values are linear.  Use value 1.0 if no texture is supplied.

clearcoatNormalTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: A tangent space normal map for the clearcoat layer.  If desired, this may be a reference to the same normal map used by the base material.  If not supplied, no normal mapping is applied to the clear coat layer.
